sentences.sContent: She said she would buy the book when it comes out in paperback.
sentences.sCn: 她说等那本书的平装本面市后她会买一本。

remMethod.val: paper(纸)+back(后面)→后面用纸装订的书→简装本

words.tran: 以平装本出版（paperback的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tranOther: A paperback is a book with a thin cardboard or paper cover. Compare .

trans.tranCn: 纸面装订的；纸面平装本书籍的
